edu.umn.se.test.frame
Class FormDataQuerier

java.lang.Object
  edu.umn.se.test.frame.FormDataQuerier

public class FormDataQuerier
extends java.lang.Object

This class' purpose is to query a set of form data about certain information. This is to reduce boilerplate code.

Author:
andrewh

Method Detail

buildFieldStrForLastIncidental

public static java.lang.String buildFieldStrForLastIncidental(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> formData,
                                                              java.lang.String fieldFormat)
                                                       throws TRAPException
Given a format string fill it with the day number for the day number of the first incidental.

Parameters:
formData - - the form data to search for the incidental in
fieldFormat - - the format string to fill with the day number
Returns:
- a string that is the result of formatting the given string with the day number for the first incidental
Throws:
TRAPException - - When the form data cannot be converted to an app.

findRentalExpenses

public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> findRentalExpenses(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> formData,
                                                                   java.lang.Boolean domestic)
                                                            throws TRAPException
Get the transportation expense number for rental expenses.

Parameters:
formData - - Form data
domestic - - If true, return only domestic rentals. If false, return only foreign rentals, If null, return all.
Returns:
- The expense number for all transportation rental expenses
Throws:
TRAPException - - When the formData cannot be converted into an app

                                                                      TransportationTypeEnum type)
                                                               throws TRAPException
Find the index (expense number) for all transportation expenses with the given type.

Parameters:
formData - - The formData to search for the transportation expenses
type - - The type of transportation expenses to look for
Returns:
- The index (expense number) of all transportation expenses with the given type.
Throws:
TRAPException - - When the form data cannot be converted to an app
